data.text: @cbu_ian @TheComixKid Deadline is one of the big trades.  Who would you prefer to listen to?
@TheComixKid The really think that Discovery is going to eat $600 million canceling every DC movie already in post

@cbu_ian @TheComixKid I give it a month before you cultists turn on Zaslav.
Gonna be real funny 😆😆

@TheComixKid Yeah, yeah, yeah right, it's gonna take a year and a half to fix all the VFX in the Flash movie lol. Smh, you guys are as crazy as the Snyder side. All I want is a good product.  Snyder side has to be Zack way even if it's bad, Hamada polar opposite smh.
@cbu_ian @TheComixKid Hahahaha I believe beadline than those Snyder cultists YouTube channels
@TheComixKid By the way, The Flash has a lot of visual effects like Endgame or ZSJL, will it be a very epic and huge movie?
@DanielMomodu1 @TheComixKid 😂 a brick wall has more brains than you my friend. Wait and see

@TheComixKid You believe everything you read in the internet? Deadline? The same that praised toby emmebitch and hamada for the amazing work they are doing? Also a year and 3 months delay could mean reshoots to fix the shit of a movie the flush was going to be. Time will tell who was right.
@TheComixKid It's like arguing with a brick wall with these people 😆😆
